attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the popes visit on the grounds that the catholic church is now the largest known pedophile organization on the planet. i also call for the immediate investigation of all catholic priests in the uk, and insist that those caught be prosecuted in british courts of law, so no cover up ( as in usa and australia )should be allowed .

rejection.details: Please rewrite your title, including spaces. We also suggest that you check the website as there may already be similar petitions on the website.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
